query:
SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.plan_id, s.status, s.start_date, s.end_date, sp.name as plan_name, sp.max_regions
FROM subscriptions s
JOIN subscription_plans sp ON s.plan_id = sp.id
WHERE s.user_id = 1;

FROM subscriptions s

WHERE s.user_id = 1;
